posts.post_content:
Hey guys, 
I bought a group of common cards on here a couple years ago with the intention of getting them graded, but haven't really had much extra funds as of late, so collecting has been put on hold. That being said, I will be selling them on here, so please post or private message me if you have any questions and/or interest in the cards.

Murphy has been sold. Reduced Price:
Asking: [STRIKE]$200[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$180[/STRIKE] $165
From left to right: street, snodgrass, nicholls, [STRIKE]murphy[/STRIKE], leach, mcquillan, lindaman
